overview: Hockey's most outrageous and controversial personality, former Boston Bruins coach Don Cherry, unleashes his 27th edition. Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 27 includes the NHL season's best plays, goals, saves, bloopers and hits, as well as highlights from Coach's Corner, and a recap of the year's Stanley Cup Playoffs.
tagline: Highlights from the 2014-2015 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 27
